name: Triton International Limited
description: Triton International Limited is a leading global provider of intermodal freight solutions, specializing in the leasing and sale of shipping containers. Established in 2016, Triton has rapidly grown to become one of the largest container leasing companies in the world, with a fleet of over 6 million twenty-foot equivalent units (TEUs). The company offers a diverse range of container types, including standard dry containers, refrigerated containers, and specialized containers for various cargo types. Triton is committed to providing innovative and reliable solutions that enhance the efficiency of global supply chains. With a strong focus on sustainability, Triton is actively working to reduce its carbon footprint and promote eco-friendly practices within the shipping industry. The company serves a broad customer base, including shipping lines, freight forwarders, and logistics companies, and has a global presence with offices and facilities strategically located in major shipping hubs around the world. Triton's mission is to deliver exceptional value to its customers, shareholders, and employees, while continuing to lead the industry in container leasing and intermodal solutions.

faq.question: Where is Triton International headquartered?
faq.answer: Triton International is headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda.

faq.question: What types of containers does Triton offer?
faq.answer: Triton offers dry containers, refrigerated containers, and specialized containers.
